DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Cariprazine Adjunctive Treatment Antidepressant Therapy ( ADT ) Patients With Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD )
DOC.criteria: Patients provide consent prior specific procedure Meet The Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th edition , text revision ( DSMIVTR ) criteria Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) Have minimum score 20 17Item Hamilton Depression ( HAMD17 ) rating scale Visits 1 2 Patients meet DSMIVTR criterion MDD
